desc: Ubuntu is a complete, free operating system that emphasizes community, support, and ease of use without compromising speed, power, or flexibility. It’s Linux for human beings, designed for everyone from computer novices to experts. Ubuntu 11.04 is the latest release–more powerful, more flexible, and friendlier than ever.

details.authors: Benjamin Hill, Matthew Helmke, Amber Graner, Corey Burger

title: The Official Ubuntu Book (6th Edition)
